trans-unit.source: Manages user interface in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Gere a interface de utilizador no designer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When the BehaviorService is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame.
trans-unit.target: Quando é criada a BehaviorService, adiciona uma janela transparente ao longo do intervalo de estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService can then use this window to render user interface elements, called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, as well as catch all mouse messages.
trans-unit.target: O BehaviorService, em seguida, pode utilizar esta janela compor elementos de interface de utilizador, denominados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objetos, bem como catch todas as mensagens de rato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: In this way, the BehaviorService can control designer behavior.
trans-unit.target: Desta forma, o BehaviorService pode controlar o comportamento do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService class supports a behavior stack, onto which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objects can be pushed.
trans-unit.target: A classe de BehaviorService suporta uma pilha de comportamento, em que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>objetos podem ser enviados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the BehaviorService can send the message to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma mensagem é intercetámo através da janela transparente, o BehaviorService pode enviar a mensagem para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>no topo da pilha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que os modos de interface de utilizador diferente, consoante o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> atualmente premido

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService is used to render all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags.
trans-unit.target: O BehaviorService é utilizada para compor todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objetos, tais como os limites de seleção, o dimensionamento identificadores e as etiquetas inteligentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorService also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting.
trans-unit.target: O BehaviorService também controla muitos momento da conceção comportamentos, como utilizar snaplines, arrastar e a seleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral do serviço de comportamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Adorners property provides access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de elementos complementares fornece acesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>gerido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>

trans-unit.source: A collection of adorner.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para a janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para a janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> na janela de ao elemento complementar para coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valor a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O transformados <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valor, em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the adorner window in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização da janela ao elemento complementar em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: The location, from the upper-left corner of the adorner window, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A localização, a partir do canto superior esquerdo da janela ao elemento complementar, em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> inicia uma operação de arrastar e largar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the BeginDrag event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>desencadeia o evento de BeginDrag imediatamente antes de iniciar uma operação de arrastar e largar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o delimitadora <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame.
trans-unit.target: A janela ao elemento complementar é uma janela transparente que residem em cima de moldura do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: This window is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to intercept all messages.
trans-unit.target: Esta janela é utilizada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>de intercetar todas as mensagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Também serve como uma tela em que pretende pintura <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> unificada

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> traduzir.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O delimitadora <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> convertido em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> translated to adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a localização de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> convertido em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> traduzir.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the location of c in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A valor que indica a localização do c em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> no topo da pilha de comportamento sem a remover.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> no topo da pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> completes a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> concluir uma operação de arrastamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the EndDrag event immediately after the drag operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>desencadeia o evento de EndDrag imediatamente depois de concluída a operação de arrastamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> immediately after the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> imediatamente após o determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> preceding the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> anterior a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> a ser devolvido.

trans-unit.source: The immediately after behavior in the behavior stack, or if there is no following behavior.
trans-unit.target: O imediatamente após behavior na pilha do comportamento, ou se não houver nenhum comportamento de seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a janela ao elemento complementar do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method forces a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>método força uma atualização de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>objetos e, em ativar, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, dentro da janela ao elemento complementar, a área de especificado o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método Invalidate irá forçar uma atualização de todas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>e, por sua vez, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A área retangular para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, dentro da janela ao elemento complementar, a área de especificado o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método Invalidate irá forçar uma atualização de todas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>e, por sua vez, todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A>

trans-unit.source: The region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A região para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Converts a point in a handle's coordinate system to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um ponto no sistema de coordenadas de um identificador as coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: An adorner window's handle.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de uma janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in a handle's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> no sistema de coordenadas de um identificador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> in the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Remove e devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> no topo da pilha.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> from the behavior stack internally maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Remove o atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>da pilha de comportamento internamente mantida por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to remove from the stack.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> para remover da pilha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> that was removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> que foi removido da pilha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> pilha está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Pushes um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The PushBehavior method is often performed by means of a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: O método PushBehavior, muitas vezes, é efetuado através de um testado de acessos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> para push.

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Pushes um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> na pilha comportamento e atribui a captura do rato para o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Enviar um comportamento de captura, muitas vezes, é feito através de um testado de acessos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: If a behavior calls the PushCaptureBehavior method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se um comportamento chama o método de PushCaptureBehavior e captura do rato é perdida, o comportamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to push.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> para push.

trans-unit.source: behavior is .
trans-unit.target: behavioris .

trans-unit.source: Translates a point in screen coordinates into the adorner window coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Converte um ponto em coordenadas de ecrã em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valor a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value, in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O transformados <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> valor, em coordenadas de janela ao elemento complementar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a seleção atual deve ser atualizada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes all selection glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Sincroniza todos os glifos de seleção.
